name: Kids' Reversible Down Alternative Comforter Set, Pirates

reviews.name: Kids' Reversible Down Alternative Comforter Set, Pirates
reviews.reviewText: I bought this despite the bad reviews. For thirteen dollars its a deal compared to other pirate bedding sets I was looking at. I already washed it to make sure it wouldn't fade and it did perfectly. I got the full and it came with two shams which are both super cute.
reviews.title: Not bad for the price.

reviews.name: Kids' Reversible Down Alternative Comforter Set, Pirates
reviews.reviewText: This is an adorable set for a little boy pirate room. The quality of this is not the best best the design was so cute we couldn't pass it up.
reviews.title: Perfect for kids room

reviews.name: Kids' Reversible Down Alternative Comforter Set, Pirates
reviews.reviewText: Wish it had curtains that matched and other bed decor
reviews.title: Loved the weight, color, feel

reviews.name: Kids' Reversible Down Alternative Comforter Set, Pirates
reviews.reviewText: WHEN I BOUGHT IT , IT WAS $29. THE COMFORTER SET MATERIAL IS VERY CHEAP . I BOUGHT IT FOR MY 4 YEAR OLD AND HAVENT EVEN WASHED IT YET BUT THE COLOR IS ALREADY FADING. IT WAS ONLY NICE WHEN I TOOK IT OUT OF THE BAG . VERY DISAPPOINTED.
reviews.title: ITS SOOO CHEAP. NOT WORTH IT.

reviews.name: Kids' Reversible Down Alternative Comforter Set, Pirates
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to buy this because of the reviews but glad I bought coz it looks great in the boys' room. Can't beat the price!
reviews.title: Bought 2 for bunk bed combo
